amendment.description: To ensure the sharing of intelligence information in a manner that promotes all-sources analysis and to assign responsibility for competitive analysis.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3739 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3739 proposed by Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S10219-10220; text: CR S10219) To ensure the sharing of intelligence information in a manner that promotes all-sources analysis and to assign responsibility for competitive analysis.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3739 proposed by Senator Roberts.
